DOC.brief_summary: The study field trial compare SafeCare family preservation model comparable usual care model parent child welfare . The study also compare two level service quality control .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Trial Project SafeCare Child Neglect
DOC.detailed_description: The study cluster-randomized field trial SafeCare ( SC ) home-based family preservation model family child welfare system . The trial conduct collaboration state child welfare agency contract in-home service system . The service system regionalized provide home service family refer child welfare . Regions state assign study either SC model service usual . Provider team , nest within region , assign either monitor unmonitored model implementation quality control condition . The aim project test client level child welfare reentry outcomes SC standard condition , across two implementation quality control condition .
DOC.criteria: Parents child welfare system neglect without physical abuse Parents child welfare system sexual abuse
